## Project Overview

This project involves creating a dashboard using Gapminder data. The dashboard provides insightful visualizations and analyses on various global development indicators.

You can view the complete project dashboard [here](https://amymwix.github.io/gapminder_dash/).

-   [Gapminder Dashboard](https://amymwix.github.io/gapminder_dash/) - The main interactive dashboard displaying various global development indicators using Gapminder data.
